messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
There's a black male yelling at me to turn off an alarm.
Can you give me your location?
I'm on Harrison and Albemarle.
Do you advise that the male is outside of the house now in the front yard?
Yes, he's outside.
Can you give me an ETA of any officers arriving?
I'm not sure, but I'm at Harrisburg Road.
Has the suspect tried to enter the house?
Yes, he kicked through the door. There's also a child in the house.
Does she know the subject?
No, she doesn't know him. She said he was wearing a green shirt and khakis or jeans.
Did he leave the yard?
She thinks he might have because the motion light went off.
Shots fired. All units hold your traffic.
Is anybody hit?
We need a medic.
Is it going to be the suspect that was hit?
Yes, suspect was hit. Suspect is down at this time.
Was the officer hit?
Yes, officer was hit by the suspect.
Was the officer shot or physically hit?
Physically hit, not shot.
Do we have a suspect that's been shot or an officer that's been hit or both?
Both.
Is anyone out with the victim?
I'm across the street. I'll go check on them.
Thank you. Please ensure you get a detailed statement from her.
Victim is 10-4. She's shaken up but okay.
Alright, make sure to get a detailed statement.
Do we need any crime scene units out there?
Yes, please send them out.
